title: JLT Specialty USA Announces Appointment of Tim Rush to JLT U.S. Aerospace Team – U.S. Space Industry
text:
CHICAGO, May 29, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- JLT Specialty USA, a U.S. subsidiary of Jardine Lloyd Thompson Group plc. (JLT) (LSE:JLT), the leading global specialist risk advisor and broker, is pleased to announce the appointment of Tim Rush as Business Development, JLT U.S. Aerospace Team – U.S. Space Industry.
Rush joins JLT’s experienced global space team with a thorough technical understanding of the specialized space industry. Rush will primarily deliver insurance solutions to support JLT’s clients’ strategies and business objectives.
With over 35 years in the commercial space industry in management and operational roles, Rush comes to JLT from RushPort Ventures, where he served as Managing Director. Rush also served as Senior Vice President, National Space Practice for Marsh where he was responsible for designing and placing bespoke property and liability insurance for businesses that launch and operate assets in space and settling claims arising under these coverages. Prior to this position, Rush served as Managing Director, Global Space Practice Group at Aon.
“We are delighted to welcome Tim to our team. His experience will deepen our resources in the broader aerospace and space industries,” said Steve Lloyd, Chief Executive Officer, Aerospace Practice at JLT Specialty USA. “Tim brings a wealth of expertise in the commercial space industry including engineering roles in Satellite design and operating Corporations.”
“Tim will provide JLT Aerospace with a specialist U.S. based resource in the Space Industry whilst working closely with our Global Space team out of London,” said Pat Donnelly, Chief Executive Officer at JLT Specialty USA. “Tim’s appointment is a reflection of our on-going commitment to hire the best talent available in our industry.”
Rush holds a Master of Business Administration from the University of Maryland and a Bachelor of Mechanical Engineering from University of Delaware.
